title: Smart mattress company Eight Sleep adds integration with Peloton, Apple health, and others
content:
Eight Sleep, which makes temperature-adjusting smart mattresses and covers, have announced new integrations on Peloton, Apple Health, Oura, Garmin, and others. With the ability to connect these other fitness and health services, you can now get even more insights into how your body recovers.

moreâ€¦

The post Smart mattress company Eight Sleep adds integration with Peloton, Apple health, and others appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Eight Sleep has announced new integrations for Peloton, Apple Health, Oura, Garmin, and other fitness trackers.
